definition: Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
east, south, west and north/all directions

pinyin: Xi1 bei3 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2
Xi1 bei3 Nong2 lin2 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
Xi1 bei3 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: lit. drink the northwest wind (idiom); cold and hungry
border area of northwest China (i.e. Xinjiang)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 xi1 bei3 bian1 chui2

definition: the five directions 五方 east, south, west, north and middle

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: Lijiang is located in Lijing Prefecture in the Northwest of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 丽江位于云南省西北部。

sentences.english: H+N+S Landscape Architects: The Netherlands forms the low-lying delta of North-Western Europe.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰位于欧洲西北部的三角洲地区，地势较低。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黄土滑坡是西北地区最为严重的地质灾害。

sentences.english: East, south, west and north, the four directions, the must be fixed according to a central position.
sentences.chinese: 东南西北，四个方向，必须有个中央位置才能确定。

sentences.english: Owais Ghani is the top administrator of Pakistan's tribal regions as the governor of the North West Frontier Province.
sentences.chinese: 加尼是巴基斯坦西北边境省省长。

sentences.english: At sundown, the strong cold wind has shifted from the southeast to the northwest.
sentences.chinese: 日落时分成，强有力的冷风由东南风转为西北风。

sentences.english: The captain put the wheel over and steered northwest.
sentences.chinese: 船长转动舵轮，向西北方向驶去。

sentences.english: Tea scholars are searching the area in Northwestern Anhui to find someone that still knows the technique with no luck.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶学家正在安徽的西北地区寻找会制作黄茶的人。

sentences.english: It's vital goal for Xinjiang Produnction & Construction Corps to safeguard the security of northwestern borders.
sentences.chinese: 保障国家西北边疆安全是新疆兵团的重要目标。

sentences.english: This paper centers on the biomass and afforestation prospect of pine plantation in northwest Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了晋西北汕松人工林的生物量与营林前景。

sentences.english: They arrived at the port of Inchon on the northwest coast.
sentences.chinese: 他们抵达仁川港西北海岸。

sentences.english: One pilot injured, one missing after aircraft plummets at NW China air show.
sentences.chinese: 西北飞豹战机表演时坠毁飞行员一生一失踪。

sentences.english: north-west / north-west; The Summer Palace is north-west of Beijing. / The Summer Palace is north-west of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 颐和园在北京的西北部。

sentences.english: Located in the northwest of Guangdong province, Guangning is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 位于广东省的西北部，广宁是一个美丽的城市。

sentences.english: Finally the Northwest Army's suppressing the Heavenly Gate Society marked the Red Spears' falling.
sentences.chinese: 西北军对天门会的镇压标志着红枪会的衰亡。

definition: north/north side/northern part/to the north of
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
land west of the Yellow river/Shaanxi, Qinghai and Gansu provinces
